title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: The Project Properties Info page uses text fields instead of labels.
EB: The Project Properties Info page should use labels instead of text fields.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Project Properties
2. Navigate to the Info page
3. Observe that text fields are used instead of labels
